td.content: s:pt presents with moderate b/l leg pain of 12 days duration together with moderate fever, moderate denial of any trauma, Blood. she is a white F aged 30 years. she denies smoking drinks daily o:Height 150 cm, Weight 50.3 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.

s:patient presents with moderate b/l leg pain for more than 3 days. pt is a F pediatrician aged 30 yrs. o:Height 150 cm, Weight 49.8 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed dilaudid - 0.015 mg/kg every 3 hours, and ordered Blood transfusion - circulatory system.

s:female pediatrician aged 31 ys c/o 9 days h/o moderate weight loss over several months (not checked), moderate vomiting, moderate nausea. NKDA. Patient does not smoke describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 5 years in her past o:Height 150 cm, Weight 49.1 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

td.content: s:patient presents with moderate vomiting, moderate nausea and moderate weight loss over several months for 12 days. she has a history of Stomach Cancer for past 2 years. she is a 31 yo f. o:Height 151 cm, Weight 51.1 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 16 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered Distal subtotal gastrectomy - stomach.

s:pt presents with progressive moderate b/l leg pain, moderate denial of any trauma and moderate fever for past 4 weeks. pt is a 31 year old f. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life Patient is a moderate drinker o:Height 151 cm, Weight 50.5 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 15, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed fentanyl PCA - 50 mcg/hour IV PCA, and ordered Hemoglobin electrophoresis, Hand XRY.
